Pre-Game Insights: The Phillies will go with Zack Wheeler as their starter, who is 13-6 with a 2.63 ERA in 27 starts.
The Marlins will go with Edward Cabrera as their starter, who is 3-6 with a 5.33 ERA in 16 starts.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be played on Friday, September 6, 2024, at 7:10 pm at LoanDepot Park.
The total runs line has gone under in each of the Phillies' last four games as favorites and in seven of the Marlins' last eight night games against National League opponents.
Others: Jake Burger has hit a home run in each of the Marlins' last five Friday night games against opponents that held a winning record.
Zack Wheeler has recorded eight or more strikeouts in each of his last three appearances with the Phillies as road favorites.
